CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 14, 1956, pg. A20, reads: "MODELS READY - This group of stunning girls is ready for the Beauty Shop Owners' fashion show, May 6, at the Fort Pitt Hotel. Standing: Roberta Waters, Virginia Brown, Ollie Peters and Jean Jones. Also Mrs. Machie Woodson, Evelyn Lilly and Beverly Johnson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seven women, including Roberta Waters, Virginia Brown, Ollie Peters, Jean Jones, Machie Woodson, Evelyn Lilly, and Beverly Johnson, posed in interior with marble wainscoting and sconces with single bulbs
